CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 30, 1959, pg. 36, reads: "NAACP Radiothon - Dedicated to obtaining democracy in fact in this country, the local chapter of the NAACP and Radio Station WAMO last Saturday held a radiothon to appeal to the populace to enlist in fight for freedom by taking out NAACP memberships... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: WAMO Radio Station disc jockeys Rev. Bill Powell and John "Sir Walter" Christian speaking into microphone, with another man on right, for NAACP Radiothon membership drive, in Centre Avenue YMCA
CatSubject_tab: Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.WAMO (Pittsburgh, Pa).Radio broadcasters--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Microphone--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Sunglasses--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
